com.spaceattack.game.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spaceattack.game.model.GameObject
      • com.spaceattack.game.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends GameObject
    Ship model representing a single ship.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship(float x, float y, float rotation, int health, float speed, float fireRate, float bulletSpeed)
      Creates a new ship model with a given position, rotation, health, speed, fireRate and bulletSpeed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(float x,
            float y,
            float rotation,
            int health,
            float speed,
            float fireRate,
            float bulletSpeed)
        Creates a new ship model with a given position, rotation, health, speed, fireRate and bulletSpeed.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of this Ship in meters.
        y - The y coordinate of this Ship in meters.
        rotation - The rotation of this Ship in radians.
        health - The health of this Ship.
        speed - The speed of this Ship in meters per second.
        fireRate - Fire rate of this Ship.
        bulletSpeed - The bullet speed of this Ship in meters per second.

    • Method Detail

      • isFlying

        public boolean isFlying()
        Gets the current status of this ship. flying variable. It is false if this ship is stopped. It is true if this ship is moving.
        Returns:
        the flying variable.

        Gets the current health of this ship.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        the isHealed field

      • increaseHealth

        public void increaseHealth()
        Increases the health of this ship. Could be with a power-up or a certain game state. The ship gains a single point on his health bar.

      • decreaseHealth

        public void decreaseHealth()
        Decreases the health of this ship. Occurs when the ship is hit. The ship loses a single point on his health bar.

      • decreaseCooldown

        public void decreaseCooldown(float delta)
        Decreases the fire cooldown of this ship. Occurs periodically
        Parameters:
        delta - time elapsed

      • setFlying

        public void setFlying(boolean flying)
        Sets the flying parameter with the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        flying - The new status for flying parameter of this ship.

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(float speed)
        Sets the speed of this ship with the given parameter, speed.
        Parameters:
        speed - The new speed of the ship. If is moving, speed greater than 0. If is stopped, speed equals to 0.

      • setFireRate

        public void setFireRate(int fireRate)
        Sets the fire rate of this ship with the given parameter, fireRate.
        Parameters:
        fireRate - The new fire rate of this ship. Can't be lower than 0.

      • setBulletSpeed

        public void setBulletSpeed(float bulletSpeed)
        Sets the bullet speed of this ship with the given parameter, bulletSpeed.
        Parameters:
        bulletSpeed - The new bullet speed of this ship. Can't be lower than 0.

        Parameters:
        status - The new triple fire status
